metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17026 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect alias information in IonMonkey JIT compiler for setting array elements could lead to a type confusion. We are aware of targeted attacks in the wild abusing this flaw. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.4.1, Thunderbird < 68.4.1, and Firefox < 72.0.1.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '72.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.4.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
